item.title: New new site
item.author: zellyn@zellyn.com (Zellyn Hunter)
item.description: I just migrated this site from Octopress to Hugo. Expect problems (and hopefully more frequent updates).

item.title: Continued fractions
item.author: zellyn@zellyn.com (Zellyn Hunter)
item.description: $$ 26 + \frac{1}{5 + \frac{1}{12 + \frac{1}{12 + \frac{1}{25 + \frac{1}{14 + \cdots}}}}} $$ Last night I lay thinking of Continued Fractions, trying to understand not just the notation, but what they mean. Trying to pull apart and unwind smaller and smaller parts of these recurrent shapes gave way, as I fell asleep, to the same kind of recursive unwinding, but of my own past. I dreamed all night of scattered childhood memories.

item.title: About me
item.author: zellyn@zellyn.com (Zellyn Hunter)
item.description: My name is Zellyn Hunter. My wife is Bevin My son is Rowen I grew up in Durban, South Africa I worked at YouTube in San Francisco for five years, from 2010-2015 I moved back to Atlanta, and now work at Square
